titles.title: Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2010
Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2010
A bill to limit investor and homeowner losses in foreclosures, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 22.

bill.summary: 3/31/2011--Reported to Senate without amendment. Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2010 [sic] - Authorizes a bankruptcy court to establish a loss mitigation program for the negotiation of consensual alternatives to avoid foreclosure between an individual debtor and the holder of a claim secured by a security interest in the debtor's principal residence.
